sentences.en: " Won't you let me get you a berth in the sleeper? "
sentences.cn: “ 我给你在卧铺车厢要个铺位好 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: " Yes, the next sleeper back does. "
sentences.cn: “ 有, 后面一节卧汽车厢就是. ”

sentences.en: ATR says reconstructing dreams is harder because the brain signals during sleep may be "noisier, " and is now researching how to get more meaningful information from a sleeper's brain.
sentences.cn: ATR表示，重现梦境更困难，因为睡梦中大脑信号也许“更嘈杂”。 他们现在正在研究如何从睡眠者的大脑中获取更有意义的信息。

sentences.en: But first he explained that he was a very heavy sleeper.
sentences.cn: 但首先他解释说自己睡觉很沉.

sentences.en: He stepped out of his first - class sleeper on the night express from London.
sentences.cn: 他从由伦敦开来的午夜快车的头等卧铺车厢里走出来.

sentences.en: He was a great sleeper, and fond of his bed.
sentences.cn: 他很能睡, 也很爱睡.

sentences.en: I booked a first - class sleeper.
I crammed my bag full of swimsuits and T-shirts and caught the sleeper down to Beziers.
sentences.cn: 我把泳衣和T恤衫塞进包里，乘卧铺前往贝济耶。

sentences.en: I have bought a ticket for a sleeper.
I usually go up to London on the sleeper.
sentences.cn: 我一般都乘卧车去伦敦.

sentences.en: I'm a very light sleeper and I can hardly get any sleep at all.
sentences.cn: 我睡觉很轻，几乎就没睡着。

sentences.en: It was some trouble to arouse the little sleeper.
sentences.cn: 要唤醒那酣睡中的孩子实在有点费劲.

sentences.en: Later he and Frichey took the sleeper to New York.
sentences.cn: 随后,他和弗里奇搭乘卧车到纽约去了.

sentences.en: Please don't make any noise — my mother's a very light sleeper.
sentences.cn: 请安静——我母亲睡觉很轻.

sentences.en: She was usually a light sleeper.

words.tran_cn: 失眠的；不休息的；警觉的；永不停息的
欲睡的；困乏的；不活跃的
卧车；卧铺；[铁路]枕木；睡眠者

trans.tran_cn: 卧车，轨枕，睡觉（呈某种状态）的人，冬眠动物
trans.tran_en: a heavy piece of wood or  concrete  that supports a railway track
